name: Lalu Kumar
tagline: Passionate Full Stack Developer building scalable, AI-driven web applications.
summary: Full Stack Developer with 1 year of experience, skilled in Java, Spring Boot, React, and Node.js. Focused on building scalable, AI-driven, and data-intensive web applications. Experienced in frontend and backend development, RESTful API design, cloud deployment, and version control.

experience.title: Full Stack Java Trainee Intern
details: Trained in Full Stack Java Development focusing on Spring Boot, JPA, and Hibernate.
Built REST APIs using Spring Boot and integrated MySQL/Oracle via JPA.
Developed web apps using JSP, Servlets, and React; implemented session-based secure CRUD operations.
Worked with Git, Postman, Eclipse, and IntelliJ IDEA following professional version control workflows.
